title: Ukiyo-e: Introduction
transcript:
Narrator: Welcome to Painting the Floating World, Ukiyo-E Masterpieces from the Weston Collection.
On this audio tour, we will journey through Japan’s pre-modern cities, from the 16 th to the 19 th centuries, a
world captured by artists of extravagance, fashion, and sensuality. Along the way, you’ll hear artist
Yoshida Ayumi, writer and editor at Teen Vogue Lucy Diavolo, and curators Janice Katz and Mami
Hatayama. We hope you enjoy the tour, and thank you for listening.
